QuestData.Title: Blessing of Zim'Abwa
QuestData.CompletionText: <Zim'Abwa's stony visage pierces your soul.$B$BZim'Abwa is pleased, but wants you to show more appreciation and respect by giving him more Drakkari offerings.$B$BHe will reward you in kind.>
QuestData.RewardText: <You sense Zim'Abwa's approval. Somehow you know that Zim'Abwa wants more tribute!>
